name: awesome-share
description: Puts an RSS/Atom subscribe button back in URL bar

scripts.build: npm run build:all && npm run build:ext
scripts.build:css: postcss css/styles/index.css -o css/styles/index.min.css -u postcss-import postcss-cssnext cssnano -m
scripts.build:ext: web-ext build -i .git/ screenshot.png package.json node_modules/ img/logos img/adwaita-icons docs/ img/ web-ext-artifacts/ '*.log*' -o
scripts.test: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:ext
scripts.postinstall: npm run git:fetch && npm run git:submodules && npm run build:all
